page.syntax: Expression as C = a5_get_expression(C default_expn [,C tables [,C required_type [,C topparent_windowname [,C variable_list [,* arrArguments ]]]]])

argument.name: Expression
argument.description: The expression created in the Expression Builder.

argument.name: default_expn
argument.description: The default expression to display in the Expression Builder.

argument.name: tables
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". A list of tables from which to get lists of fields and variables.

argument.name: required_type
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". A variable data type.

argument.name: topparent_windowname
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The name of an open window.

argument.name: arrArguments
argument.description: Optional. Default = NULL_VALUE(). Refer to SQL::Arguments Object.

page.description: Prompts the user for an expression
page.discussion: The A5_GET_EXPRESSION() function displays the Expression Builder.
